text: Wet 'n Wild is a chain of waterparks including Wet 'n Wild Orlando and Wet 'n Wild Hawaii. Orlando's Wet 'n Wild is across the street from Universal Studios Orlando. Wet 'n Wild is owned by Universal Parks in Orlando. ==Other websites== * Wet 'n Wild website ==References== Category:Theme parks in the United States
title: Wet 'n Wild (brand)
